effect.then: No, I, um, well, I don't have a stomach.
You know like the electricity that, runs into your house. That current, well, well it flows when electrons all moveing one direction inside a wire.
I'm kind of a book worm.
Someday, I hope they'll give me a stomach, like a fuel cell you know, and some olfactory sensors so I can taste and smell.
I kind of eat electrons, you know.
